response.original_title: Blutengel: Live at M'era Luna Festival 2025
response.overview: Since 1998, the Berlin-based band Blutengel has been taking darkwave and electro-gothic to a new level. With dark tracks like "Engelsblut" (Angel's Blood), they captivate their fans. Their performance is more than just music: Chris Pohl and Viki Scarlet transport listeners to a mysterious world through visual experiences, elaborate costumes, and mesmerizing lighting effects.  Setlist: "Black", "Lucifer", "Into the Void", "Engelsblut", "Dein Gott", "My Creation", "She Wears Black", "King of Blood", "The Right Path", "Tief", "Reich mir die Hand", "You Walk Away"
response.tagline: Recorded August 10, 2025 at the M'era Luna Festival in Hildesheim.
response.title: Blutengel: Live at M'era Luna Festival 2025
